Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Third Alternative[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Quantity of Strategic Resources produced is doubled. +5 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +5 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
